title: Foreign Outflows Challenge Indonesia’s Bond Market Standing
description: A foreign investor exodus from Indonesia’s bond market has driven holdings to the lowest in nearly two decades, underscoring shaken confidence in the once-coveted asset after months of political turbulence.
content: A foreign investor exodus from Indonesia’s bond market has driven holdings to the lowest in nearly two decades, underscoring shaken confidence in the once-coveted asset after months of political turbulence.
